org.apache.activemq.core.server

Class LiveNodeLocator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.activemq.core.server.LiveNodeLocator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.activemq.api.core.client.ClusterTopologyListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AnyLiveNodeLocatorForReplication, AnyLiveNodeLocatorForScaleDown, NamedLiveNodeLocatorForReplication, NamedLiveNodeLocatorForScaleDown, NamedNodeIdNodeLocator

    public abstract class LiveNodeLocator
extends Object
implements org.apache.activemq.api.core.client.ClusterTopologyListener
    A class that will locate a particular live server running in a cluster. How this live is chosen is a job for the implementation. This is used for replication (which needs a QuorumManager) and scaling-down (which does not need a QuorumManager).
    Author:
    Andy Taylor, Justin Bertram

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LiveNodeLocator()
      Use this constructor when the LiveNodeLocator is used for scaling down rather than replicating
